医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学审查探讨小豆在糖尿病预防和管理方面的功效补充红豆（Vigna angularis）可预防和控制 2 型糖尿病 (T2D)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Scientific-review-explores-adzuki-beans-efficacy-in-diabetes-prevention-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Scientific-review-explores-adzuki-beans-efficacy-in-diabetes-prevention-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad7c4e02-d321-4ef0-aa38-d29b0ec2fdc6 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 06:23:00 -0500 Scientific review explores adzuki beans' efficacy in diabetes prevention and management
研究解决了黑人黑色素瘤患者临床特征和结果的知识差距研究人员确定了黑人患者和肿瘤水平的黑色素瘤特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Study-addresses-knowledge-gap-of-clinical-features-and-outcomes-of-Black-病人-with-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Study-addresses-knowledge-gap-of-clinical-features-and-outcomes-of-Black-病人-with-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=826b33a9-bb5c-46f1-8420-e2147b942466 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 06:08:00 -0500 Study addresses knowledge gap of clinical features and outcomes of Black patients with melanoma
腰背疼痛？有好消息也有坏消息研究人员对急性、亚急性和持续性腰痛的临床病程进行了荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Low-back-pain-Theree28099s-good-and-bad-news.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Low-back-pain-Theree28099s-good-and-bad-news.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dacfbcf-2728-4097-bfc0-70cc6c248506 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:48:00 -0500 Low back pain? There’s good and bad news
新研究揭示绝经后骨质疏松症治疗的最佳药物测序现有序贯治疗对绝经后骨质疏松症长期管理的有效性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-study-reveals-optimal-drug-sequencing-for-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-study-reveals-optimal-drug-sequencing-for-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64cd7747-32eb-4812-b1d3-52be67286d48 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:43:00 -0500 New study reveals optimal drug sequencing for postmenopausal osteoporosis treatment
全国民意调查显示，六分之一的人承认他们可能不知道自己的孩子是否在网上投注CS 莫特儿童医院全国儿童健康民意调查对全国 14 至 18 岁青少年的家长进行了调查，以收集有关在线博彩行为和家长意识的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/One-in-six-admit-they-probously-wouldnt-know-if-their-child-was-betting-online-national-poll-suggests。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/One-in-six-admit-they-probously-wouldnt-know-if-their-child-was-betting-online-national-poll-suggests。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85936296-f3a9-46db-96ce-bf66eddcc4a6 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 05:25:00 -0500 One in six admit they probably wouldn't know if their child was betting online, national poll suggests
研究表明，童年时期接受照顾者的温暖可以保护以后的心血管健康研究人员研究了儿童时期的危险家庭（RF）环境与心血管健康（CVH）之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Research-shows-that-receiving-warmth-from-a-caregiver-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Research-shows-that-receiving-warmth-from-a-caregiver-during-childhood-protects-cardioangio-health-later-in-life.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0539f77d-cddd-4d2b-993b-5e44956883fc Thu, 25 Jan 2024 04:41:00 -0500 Research shows that receiving warmth from a caregiver during childhood protects cardiovascular health later in life
关于为什么免疫疗法对某些癌症有效而对其他癌症无效的新见解德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的科学家们共同撰写的一项多机构研究发现了癌细胞阻止免疫系统激活和攻击癌性入侵者的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-insights-into-why-immunotherapy-works-for-some-cancers-not-others.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-insights-into-why-immunotherapy-works-for-some-cancers-not-others.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32c040be-a62d-4e17-b5f8-5ac2f68576fb Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:56:55 -0500 New insights into why immunotherapy works for some cancers, not others
研究发现早产儿出现长期神经发育问题的风险更高《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项针对超过 100 万儿童的研究发现，中度（32-33 周）或晚期早产（34-36 周）出生的儿童出现神经发育困难的长期风险较高，这会影响他们的行为和学习能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Preterm-babies-at-higher-risk-of-long-term-neurodevelopmental-issues-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Preterm-babies-at-higher-risk-of-long-term-neurodevelopmental-issues-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f43503e-d31d-4110-a6be-4aa9602885fb Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:47:11 -0500 Preterm babies at higher risk of long-term neurodevelopmental issues, study finds
RT-PCR 基因分型在快速准确的 COVID-19 变异追踪方面优于全基因组测序JAMA Network Open 中的一项研究表明，RT-PCR 基因分型测定是一种比 WGS 更快、更具成本效益的替代方案，可用于 SARS-CoV-2 变异监测，具有较高的准确性和可扩展性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/RT-PCR-genotyping-outperforms-whole-genome-sequencing-in-speedy-and-accurate-COVID-19-variant-tracking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/RT-PCR-genotyping-outperforms-whole-genome-sequencing-in-speedy-and-accurate-COVID-19-variant-tracking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b64a5576-766e-48a5-b4b6-52e129cfc126 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:43:00 -0500 RT-PCR genotyping outperforms whole-genome sequencing in speedy and accurate COVID-19 variant tracking
研究发现，情绪助推器可将 IBD 炎症减少 18%伦敦国王学院的新研究表明，与不进行情绪干预相比，改善情绪的干预措施可以将炎症性肠病患者的炎症水平降低 18%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Mood-boosters-reduce-inflammation-in-IBD-by-1825-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Mood-boosters-reduce-inflammation-in-IBD-by-1825-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c095ae7e-3916-4713-8682-d842580c7397 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:33:42 -0500 Mood boosters reduce inflammation in IBD by 18%, study finds
